name: A Basic Preparation for Snails (Escargots au court-bouillon)
recipeIngredient: 4 sprigs parsley, tied into a bundle

recipeInstructions.text: This is a basic preparation for snails. The snails are cooked and drained before being used in other recipes.
Combine all of the ingredients in a saucepan or skillet. Bring to the boil and let simmer for 10 minutes. Let cool and drain.
